luxembourgish: Wéi seet een dat op Lëtzebuergesch?
english: How do you say that in Luxembourgish?
I have lived here for 3 years
The kitchen is big and modern
The living room is bright and cozy
I live on the first floor

luxembourgish: Wéi komm ech op de Flughafen?
english: How do I get to the airport?
The first street on the left
When does the next train leave?

luxembourgish: Ech hätt gär e Billett no Lëtzebuerg
english: I would like a ticket to Luxembourg
How long does the journey take?
I need to go to the train station
What do you like to do?
What do you like to do?
I like to listen to music

luxembourgish: Ech ginn gär an de Kino
english: I like to go to the cinema

luxembourgish: Mäi Brudder ass méi al wéi ech
english: My brother is older than me

luxembourgish: Wéi laang léiers du scho Lëtzebuergesch?
english: How long have you been learning Luxembourgish?
I have been learning for one year
I still have a lot to learn

luxembourgish: Wou bass du op Vakanz gaang?
english: Where did you go on vacation?
In the photo you can see ...
In front there is a person
